tyre_specifications.width: First number in tyre size (e.g., 195 in 195/65 R15) - measured in millimeters
tyre_specifications.aspect_ratio: Second number (e.g., 65 in 195/65 R15) - sidewall height as % of width
tyre_specifications.rim_diameter: Last number (e.g., 15 in 195/65 R15) - wheel size in inches
tyre_specifications.load_index: Maximum weight tyre can carry (e.g., 91 = 615 kg)
tyre_specifications.speed_rating: Maximum speed capability (e.g., H = 210 km/h, V = 240 km/h, W = 270 km/h)

common_queries.tyre_life: Typically 40,000-60,000 km or 3-5 years, depending on usage and maintenance
common_queries.when_to_replace: When tread depth is below 1.6mm, visible cracks, bulges, or uneven wear
common_queries.alignment_frequency: Every 10,000 km or if vehicle pulls to one side
common_queries.balancing_frequency: Every tyre change or if vibration felt at high speeds
common_queries.nitrogen_vs_air: Nitrogen maintains pressure longer, reduces oxidation, but air is sufficient for most users
common_queries.warranty: Most brands offer 1-5 year warranty against manufacturing defects
common_queries.installation_time: 30-45 minutes for 4 tyres including alignment and balancing

faqs.How do I find the right tyre size?: Check your vehicle manual, look at the sidewall of your current tyre, or tell us your vehicle make/model/variant and we'll find it for you.
faqs.Do you offer installation?: Yes! We offer both home installation (within 24 hours) and installation at 1000+ partner stores across India.
faqs.What brands do you have?: We have all major brands including MRF, CEAT, Apollo, Bridgestone, Michelin, Pirelli, JK Tyre, Goodyear, Continental, and 40+ more brands.
faqs.How long does delivery take?: Standard delivery within 24-48 hours. Same-day delivery available in major cities for orders before 2 PM.
faqs.Do you offer warranty?: Yes, all tyres come with manufacturer warranty ranging from 1-5 years against manufacturing defects.
faqs.Can I compare tyres?: Absolutely! Our website allows you to compare features, prices, and reviews of multiple tyres side-by-side.
faqs.What payment methods do you accept?: We accept all major payment methods including cards, UPI, net banking, wallets, EMI, and cash on delivery.
faqs.Do you have EMI options?: Yes, we offer EMI options on orders above ₹3,000 through credit cards and financing partners.
faqs.What if I'm not satisfied?: We have a 7-day return policy if tyres are unused and in original condition.
faqs.Do you service commercial vehicles?: Yes, we have tyres for trucks, buses, three-wheelers, and tractors.
